title: Miami Picks a New Starter, Dallas’s Defense Continues to Struggle, and Coaching Hierarchy | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Ryan and Cole recap the 'Monday Night Football' games, but first Ryan starts by reacting to the breaking news that Tua Tagovailoa will be starting for the Miami Dolphins after their Week 7 bye. Then Ryan breaks down what each coach's responsibility is and they preview the battle for the best record in the AFC between the Steelers and Titans.  
Hosts: Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright
